findings.title: EIP-2612 permit is not encouraged to be used in zksync era
findings.description: The EIP-2612 permit function is implemented in zksPair contracts, but it's not recommended to use it in zksync era due to native account abstraction support.

findings.title: Inconsistent SQRT Method Implementation
findings.description: The Math Library uses different methods to calculate SQRT, which can lead to inconsistencies and potential security issues.

findings.title: Gas Optimization:No need to call abi.encodePacked when there's only a single bytes argument
findings.description: The function keccak256(abi.encodePacked(type(ZksPair).creationCode)) can be optimized by removing abi.encodePacked since it has only one bytes argument.

findings.title: Gas Optimization:Unused variable
findings.description: Variables not used could be deleted to save gas. Variable `INIT_CODE_PAIR_HASH` not used in `ZksFactory` contract, but used in deploy scripts to do some test or debug.

findings.title: Missing error message in require statements
findings.description: In the transferFrom function of WETH.sol contract, require statements lack appropriate error messages to better understand the reason for triggering the require.

findings.title: Unlocked Pragma Version
findings.description: Most solidity files have a pragma solidity version number with ^0.8.0. The caret (^) points to unlocked pragma, meaning the compiler will use the specified version or above.
